title: Study the squirrels
code: get_message_fur_color(primary_fur_color = "Black") #> We will focus on Black squirrels get_message_fur_color(primary_fur_color = "White") #> We will focus on White squirrels get_message_fur_color(primary_fur_color = "Green") #> We will focus on Green squirrels
